summary: Provides transformation utilities and configuration for the experimental pass‑through mode of Anthropic models, converting between Anthropic request/response schemas and the generic Litellm/OpenAI formats, including handling of messages, tools, streaming deltas, usage data, and finish reasons.
business_intent: Allow developers to integrate Anthropic LLMs through Litellm with minimal code changes by automatically mapping Anthropic API structures to the standard Litellm/OpenAI interface, supporting advanced features like tool calls and streaming.
